lead_paragraph: GERSHOWITZ--Gert, age 95, died Tuesday, May 3, 2016. Beloved wife of the late Abe Gershowitz. Loving mother of Lynne (Jim) and Marc (Maressa). Grandmother of Arlene (Gregg), Eric (Aimee), Elissa (Ken) and Rebecca (Bob). Great-grandmother of Jared, Jacob, Alex, Noah, Robert, Joshua and Zachary. Caring school and hospital nurse, lover of Yiddish, cherished friend, and world traveler who connected with people worldwide. She touched many lives, loved by all. Funeral, Monday, May 9 at 1pm, Plaza Jewish Community Chapel, 630 Amsterdam Ave., NYC. Donations to YIVO, JSSA Hospice, Rockville, MD, or a charity of your choice. 1/3
